Text:
function RIR_EP05_04()
    -- .起-3【1月第2週】「テッペン獲るぞオラァン」
    SaveData.Title = "テッペン獲るぞオラァン"

    -- //BG：大講堂
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ The opening ceremony after winter break. The coed faction moved faster than I expected. ]])

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0442.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "Erika-chan, sorry for interrupting during the opening ceremony! There’s something I absolutely want to tell you<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1585.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "No, it’s totally fine. But what exactly are you going to talk about in front of the entire school?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ At the end of the opening ceremony, during the student representative’s speech, Hermes-san called me up onto the stage. ]])

    MSG([[ Expecting some kind of move, I calmly followed her instructions and faced her. ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san wore her usual bright and innocent expression. Still, I couldn't let my guard down. I believed I mustn’t lower it. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0443.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "Actually, I was thinking it would be great if even more boys joined the boys’ division from next year on~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Hey hey, Erika-chan, what do you think?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1586.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 "M-more boys in the boys’ division...!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：大講堂正面
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020aa")
    -- //BU：ヒユ（焦り）、リラ（焦り）、ウラン、（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_RIR07ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1105.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】焦り
 "T-that’s a bold move... The Himegami family’s coming at us hard. Don’t get swallowed up, Minato-kun." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024aa")
    -- //BU：エルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1587.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑・汗
 "That’s a sudden question. Why would you ask something like that?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was a bit shaken by such a blunt question. ]])

    MSG([[ I never imagined Hermes-san would ask something so direct. It was truly unexpected. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0444.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】通常
 "Since I’m graduating this year, I want to leave something behind at Yuriai Private Academy—so I’ve been thinking about various things!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0445.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】ウインク
 "And after consulting with Mother, I found out that filling up the boys’ division would make everyone happiest~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0446.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "So, what do you think? Can you share your thoughts on behalf of everyone else, Erika-chan?" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san pressed on in her usual cheerful manner. ]])

    MSG([[ As always, I didn’t sense any ill intent. Actually, I guessed she was acting with good intentions. ]])

    MSG([[ Because of that, I couldn’t easily brush her off and found myself struggling to answer. It’s much harder to deal with someone without malice. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1106.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Erikaa!" ]])

    MSG([[ At that moment, I heard Lira-san’s voice from the audience. ]])

    -- //CI：リラ（真剣） 134
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG020aa")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200,7)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,85)
    SET_CUTIN_02_L(100, 500)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1107.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "No need to panic! Just honestly say how you feel!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1588.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 "Lira-san..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    RESET_CUTIN_02_RIGHT(100, 500)

    MSG([[ Thanks to Lira-san, I regained my composure. ]])

    MSG([[ She was right. Whether or not the other person has bad intentions doesn’t change my answer. ]])

    MSG([[ I just have to trust my own thoughts. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1589.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 "I can’t agree to increasing the number of boys in the boys’ division all at once." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0447.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】驚き
 "E-Erika-chan...!?" ]])

    MSG([[ I spoke my true thoughts aloud. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1590.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】笑顔
 "I’m not against coeducation. However, if we do increase, it should be gradually. We must be careful not to break Yuriai Private Academy’s traditions." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0448.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】焦り
 "Ugh... Y-yeah, that’s true... But I want to make Yuriai Private Academy better as soon as possible. What should I do—" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san thought hard with a worried hum. From that gesture too, I felt no malice or calculation. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0449.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】笑顔
 "Oh! If I win the Princess Election in March, Erika-chan, you should join the coed faction too!" ]])

    MSG([[ I thought, here it comes. ]])

    MSG([[ —The Princess Election. An annual event where we decide the top “princess” at Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

    MSG([[ True to expectations, Hermes-san suggested settling things through that election. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1591.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "Understood. However, if I win, I have one request. There’s someone I want you to meet." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU01ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0450.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】ウインク
 "Hehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> That’s totally fine~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> I’m looking forward to it, I’m looking forward to it~!" ]])

    MSG([[ If I win, I’ll have Hermes-san report my victory to Marika-neesan herself. ]])

    MSG([[ If there’s a way to awaken Marika-neesan, it has to be that. ]])

    MSG([[ With the time limit in mind, this would undoubtedly be my—Ikusa Erika’s—final battle— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：1-A教室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ After the opening ceremony. ]])

    MSG([[ When I returned to the classroom after the Princess Election meeting, the “Knights” were in an uproar. ]])

    MSG([[ Naturally, since I’d unexpectedly declared participation in the election. ]])

    -- //BU：ヒユ（焦り）、モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ・Ｇ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-700,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,250,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-250,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0391.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】焦り
 "E-Erika-nee-sama facing off against Hermes-sama in the Princess Election… Just imagining it makes me so nervous I could die!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("reika_0028.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Reika Sakurajima】
 "Do you think Erika-sama can actually beat Hermes-sama!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("kyohka_0030.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Kyoka Himekaido】
 "There’s no way Erika-nee-sama could lose!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("sakuya_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Sakuya Yurikawa】
 "C-Calm down, everyone. Look, here comes Princess Erika. See?" ]])

    MSG([[ They were so flustered they barely noticed I was back. ]])

    MSG([[ My heart ached at the chaos I’d caused by my actions. ]])

    MSG([[ Maybe I should’ve properly explained the situation to the “Knights” first…? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1108.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Hey, why are you daydreaming?" ]])
    -- //リラ

    MSG([[ A student tapped my back and stepped into the classroom. ]])

    --LAYER_POSITION(50,800,0)
    --LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    --LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    --LAYER_POSITION(65,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1109.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】真剣
 "Alright, listen up! You’re acting way too hectic though the 'Princess' has returned! Get it together!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0037")
    MSG([[
    【‘Knights’】
 "Y-yes, sir!" ]])

    MSG([[ Scolded by Lira-san, the “Knights” quickly snapped to attention. ]])

    MSG([[ Like a military superior. Watching her commanding presence, I thought she’s far more suited to leadership than me. ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san stood beside me at the podium and continued speaking as she looked over everyone. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1110.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】通常
 "I get that you’d panic if your own ‘Princess’ just declared participation in the Princess Election in front of everyone, but you have to believe in Erika." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1111.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】真剣
 "The Erika-chan you believe in isn’t someone who acts recklessly, or challenges pointless matches, right?" ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone silently nodded at Lira-san’s words. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1112.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】ウインク
 "See? You get it. Now Erika’s gonna talk about the Princess Election, so listen up." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san winked at me to encourage me to continue. ]])

    MSG([[ Grateful for her deft leadership, I began explaining my resolve regarding the Princess Election. ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1592.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "Sorry for deciding to join the Princess Election without consulting everyone. But I believed I had to settle things with Hermes-san." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1593.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "Daria-san, who promised to support my faction, informed me that the Himegami family, Hermes-san’s family, is pushing hard for coeducation." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1594.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 "To protect Yuriai Private Academy’s traditions, I can’t back down. This will be a tough fight, but please lend me your strength." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：拍手（小）
PLAY_SE("SEa020.wav")
    -- //SE：拍手（中）
PLAY_SE("SEa021.wav")

    MSG([[ The “Knights” responded to my words with applause. ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone is fighting alongside me. With these comrades, I’m not afraid even if the opponent is the Himegami family. ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1113.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】笑顔
 "Alright then, to get pumped up, how about we all shout ‘Ei ei oh!’ together?" ]])

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）、ヒユ（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    --LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-800,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0392.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】焦り
 "W-wait! That’s the role of me, the chief ‘Knight’—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1114.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】笑顔
 "Ei! Ei! Oh!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0038")
    MSG([[
    【‘Knights’】
 "Ooooooooooooooooh!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0393.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】焦り
 "Hyuaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!? I won’t forgive you, Lira-saaan!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Lira-san swiftly gathered the flustered class and rallied them. ]])

    MSG([[ Watching her charismatic and confident back— ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1595.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】苦笑
 (I think she’s much more suited to be Princess than I am...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I couldn’t help but think that. ]])

    -- 　　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP05_05")
end
